ext:id.description: A ticket ID from an external system.

ext:url.description: A URL to the ticket in an external system.

epic.description: The epic that includes the ticket.

created.description: The time the ticket was created.

updated.description: The last time the ticket was updated.

points.description: Optional SCRUM style story points value.

sprint.description: The sprint that contains the ticket.

type.description: The type of ticket. (eg story / bug)

creator.description: The synapse user who created the ticket.

assignee.description: The synapse user who the ticket is assigned to.
